0101011101011010 1000010101010100 0 -> sum: 1101110010101110, cout: 0
0000110001000110 1000101000011101 0 -> sum: 1001011001100011, cout: 0
0000000111111010 1101010001111111 0 -> sum: 1101011001111001, cout: 0
1010001001101001 0011110000100001 1 -> sum: 1101111010001011, cout: 0
0010001101101011 0001110011001011 1 -> sum: 0100000000110111, cout: 0
1101011001011110 0000110100000010 1 -> sum: 1110001101100001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
